getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.heading: Let's get started
getStarted.blurb:
dootools is in the early days of its hopefully long and prosperous life.

We are looking for early adopters that want to help shape the future of the product, we don’t just want to design a product with the users (parents and activity providers) in mind, we want a product designed by the users - with the help of our technical wizards of course!

If you’re interested in becoming an early adopter or just want to stay in the loop, then fill out the form and we’ll be in touch.
